item.title: About Me
item.description: My blog, where I write about myself, and the projects I’m working on

item.title: Most craziest new year I've ever had
item.description: UK has got a knack for giving me crazy and eventful new years

item.title: Why do I have a blog
item.description: Why? Get hired I use this blog as a clever tactic to attract awesome recruiters and companies who might want to hire me. It’s like my own personal job-hunting billboard, but with more GIFs and less awkward handshakes. Improve my writing/language skills Okay, so maybe I’m not the next Shakespeare (yet), but I’m constantly working on it! Every time someone visits my blog, I learn a new word to add to my ever-growing vocabulary.

item.title: Tweedisc, a twitter integration bot
item.description: An application to use Twitter without leaving the comfort of Discord

item.title: Play Piano on a PC Keyboard
item.description: An idea/WIP that allows people to play (any) instruments on their laptop/pc
